content: row 11 to 14 switching colour where indicated row 17-22 repeat row 9 to 14 switching colour where indicated row 31 rs switch to longer length larger needle and mc knit row 23 increase row three rs switch to mc and work k4 *yo k3 repeat from * to last row 32 ws k3 wyib sl1 purl-wise purl to last 4 sts k4 5 sts yo k5 31 33 sts increase row 33 rs k3 wyif sl1 purl-wise knit to end of row stitch count 130 138 repeat row 32 and 33 finishing with a ws row until yoke row 24 ws knit measures from the cast on edge to the needles 3½ /9cms row 25 buttonhole two rs switch to cc and knit until until last 3 sts yo k2tog k1 www tikkiknits com au pattern is for personal use only 4 | gidday baby split for body and sleeves repeat rounds 1 to 8 next row rs k3 wyif sl1 purl-wise knit 16 17 sts kfab stitch count 30 32 into next stitch slip next 26 28 sts onto waste yarn and backward loop cast knit straight in stocking stitch until sleeve measures 4½/11 5 on 5 6 sts 5½/14 as measured from the underarm join kfab into next st knit 34 36 kfab into next st slip next 26 28 sts onto waste yarn and backward loop cast note sleeve cuff will add an additional ¾ /2cm on 5 6 sts kfab into next st knit to end of row sleeve cuffs stitch count 92 98 switch to your smaller size 8 /20cm or preferred option for small circumference knitting body row 1 ws k3 wyib sl1 purl-wise purl to last 4 sts k4 round 1 switch to cc and knit row 2 rs k3 wyif sl1 purl-wise knit to end of row round 2 purl repeat row 1 and 2 until garment measures approximately round 3 switch to mc and knit 9¾/24 5 10¼/26 inches/cms as measured from the shoulder point next to the neckline finishing with a rs row round 4 purl note hemline will add an additional ¾ /2cm rounds 5-7 repeat rounds 1 to 3 cast off loosely purl-wise hemline knit 6 row repeat for other sleeve cast off loosely on the ws finishing sleeves weave in all ends and sew on buttons soak in a good quality place one set of held stitches on your choice of us6/4mm wool wash and wet block gently being careful to not needles for small circumference knitting pick up and knit from overstretch the garment the underarm cast on edge of the body 10 sts stitch count 36 38 you can find the comprehensive version of this pattern on ravelry to fit up to a 30 /76cm chest knit round to the last original sleeve stitch ssk worked over look for the pattern gidday the last of the sleeve sts and the first of the picked up sts k4 place sm to indicate sor k4 k2tog
